item.title: Cookie Run Kingdom Codes (March 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Cookie Run Kingdom Codes
  • Cookie Run Kingdom Social Media
  • How to Redeem Codes in Cookie Run Kingdom

While not required for gameplay, Cookie Run Kingdom has offered many different special codes to help players toward their gacha pulls. These codes can be found on various official social media pages such as Twitter and YouTube.

Updated March 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Only one Cookie Run: Kingdom code is currently available for redemption. This code grants valuable rewards, including Crystals and Rainbow Cubes. Be sure to claim it before it expires, as codes in the game tend to be time-limited. Stay tuned for future updates with new rewards.

All Cookie Run Kingdom Codes

Active Cookie Run Kingdom Codes

  • 100KSUBSCOOKIETH (3,000 Crystals, 1,500 Rainbow Cubes)

Expired Cookie Run Kingdom Codes

  • 2025COOKIERUNFAN (1,000 Crystals)
  • CRK4THANNIVERSARYEIT (3,000 Crystals)
  • CRK4THANNIVERSARYDEC (150 Juicy Stamina Jellies, 50 Radiant Beascuit Dough)
  • CRK4THANNIVERSARYOF (1,500 Rainbow Cubes)
  • CRK4THANNIVERSARYOW ( 4 Fateful Cookie Cutters)
  • CRK4THANNIVERSARYSH (1,000 Choco Chalks)
  • PONPONLINKINGDOM (3,000 Choco Chalk, 3,000 Rainbow Cubes, 3,000 Crystals)
  • COOKIERUNFUNTRIP (1,000 Crystals)
  • HYROOLINKINGDOM (3,000 Crystals, 3,000 Rainbow Cubes, 3,000 Choco Chalk)
  • KINGDOMLIVE2412 (10 Fateful Cookie Cutter, 3,000 Crystals, 3,000 Rainbow Cubes, 150x Radiant Beascuit Dough, x300 Juicy Stamina Jellies)
  • HUSBANDOFTHEYEAR (3,000 Crystals, 1,500 Rainbow Cubes, 1,000x Choco Chalks)
  • FIVEHUNDREDTWEET (3,000 Crystals, 500 Rainbow Cubes, 500x Choco Chalks)
  • ONEHUNDREDHOORAY (3,000 Crystals, 500x Rainbow Cubes, 500x Choco Chalks)
  • KINGDOMLIVE2409 (1,500x Wind Gems,150x Radiant Beascuit Dough, x3,000 Crystals, x300 Juicy Stamina Jellies, x1,50 Rainbow Cube)
  • NDRUNNERCOMBO441 (3,000x Crystals, 3,000x Rainbow Cubes, 1,000x Choco Chalks, 10x Fateful Cookie Cutters, 150x Radiant Beascuit Dough)
  • MYCOOKIECHIMCHAK (3,000x Crystals, 1,500x Rainbow Cubes, 1,000x Choco Chalks, 300x Juicy Stamina Jellies)
  • HAPPYDISCORDBDAY (3,000x Crystals and 500x Rainbow Cubes)
  • COOKIERUNBRAVE15 (1,500 Crystals)
  • UPDATEFIRSTCREAM (1,500 Crystals, 300x Rainbow Cubes)
  • LOVEWITCHSCASTLE (1,500 Crystals, 300x Rainbow Cubes)
  • MISSEARTHBREAD24 (3,000 Crystals, 1,000x Rainbow Cubes)
  • CRK3RDANNIVERSARYT (500,000x Coins)
  • CRK3RDANNIVERSARYAS (5x Special Cookie Cutter)
  • CRK3RDANNIVERSARYBE (500x Rainbow Cubes)
  • FROMKINGDOMWITHLOVE (1,500x Rainbow Cubes, 3,000x Crystals)
  • INCRK3RDANNIVERSARY (1,000 Crystals)
  • CRK3RDANNIVERSARYST (500,000 Coins)
  • WELCOMETOBEASTYEAST (3,000x Crystals, 1,500x Rainbow Cubes, 10x Aurora Pillars, 10x Aurora Bricks, 10x Aurora Compass, 10x Magic Cookie Cutters, 100x EXP Star Jellies Lv.6, 250,000x Coins)
  • CRK3RDANNIVERSARYA (150x Topping Pieces)
  • CRK3RDANNIVERSARYYE (5x Magic Cookie Cutter)
  • GOOGLEPLAY2023 (3,000 Crystals and 1,000 Rainbow Cubes)
  • CRKINDONESIA (3,000 Crystals)
  • BEWAREOFTHEMERGELCS (3000 Crystals)
  • CRKALWAYSLOVEYOU (1000 Radiant Shards, 30 Time Jumpers, 1500 Rainbow Cubes, 3000 Crystals, 10 Magic Cookie Cutters, 100 EXP Star Jelly Lv. 6, 250000 Coins, 100 Topping Pieces, 8 Aurora Compass', 8 Aurora Pillars, 8 Aurora Bricks)
  • CRK2NDBIRTHDAYD1 (100 EXP Star Jelly Lv. 6)
  • CRK2NDBIRTHDAYD2 (3 Aurora Compass', 3 Aurora Pillars, 3 Aurora Bricks)
  • CRK2NDBIRTHDAYD3 (100 Topping Pieces)
  • CRK2NDBIRTHDAYD4 (500 Rainbow Cubes)
  • CRK2NDBIRTHDAYD5 (30 Time Jumpers)
  • CRK2NDBIRTHDAYD6 (10 Treasure Tickets)
  • CRK2NDBIRTHDAYD7 (3 Special Cookie Cutters)

Cookie Run Kingdom Social Media

There are multiple English social media accounts owned by the Cookie Run Kingdom staff. By following these accounts, players will be able to discover new redeemable codes when they are first released to the public. Some of these accounts are:

CRKingdomEN - Twitter

Cookie Run: Kingdom - YouTube

CRKingdomEN - Facebook

CookieRunKingdom - Instagram

CookieRun_En - TikTok

How to Redeem Codes in Cookie Run Kingdom

It is important to know that publicly released codes can only be used once per DevPlay account and cannot be endlessly used in one kingdom.

For the majority of players, the coupon redemption screen can be found by first entering the menu in the top right corner of the screen while outside of battle. In this menu, select the Coupons button to open up the web browser to the redemption screen.

Players who do not have the option to go directly to the redemption screen from in-game can still enter it by going to this website.

In order to enter a code, players need to have both a code and the name of their DevPlay account. Players can find the name of their DevPlay account by going into Cookie Run Kingdom 's Settings menu. From here, the name of the DevPlay account being used at the time can be found in the upper left corner of the Info tab. If the DevPlay account is an email address, the entire email address needs to be entered on the code redemption screen.

Once the process is complete, rewards will be received in the Mailbox and players can claim them right away.

item.title: Roblox: Ro Ghoul Codes (March 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Ro Ghoul Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Ro Ghoul
  • Ro Ghoul Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Roblox Anime Games Like Ro Ghoul
  • About the Ro Ghoul Developer

In Ro Ghoul , Roblox players will plunge into the world of Ghouls and strong evolved creatures, where the main task will be survival. They can also experience the game as a hunter or prey. This article offers Roblox players all the latest Ro Ghoul codes, which they can use to increase their chances of survival in this cruel world.

Updated March 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Ro Ghoul c odes provide Yen, RC Cells, and other rewards to enhance your character. They help speed up progress by offering free resources. Some codes drop with major updates or special events. Stay updated to claim them before they expire.

Ro Ghoul Codes

This game was created quite a while ago, and the developers are still updating it and adding active codes. Hurry up and redeem all active codes before they become inactive. This article is constantly updated, so players can keep updated with the latest new codes.

Codes Checked on March 8, 2025.

Working Ro Ghoul Codes

  • !Code BangBang - Insert this code to claim RC and Yen. (NEW)
  • !Code 1kLikesOvernightYEN - Insert this code to claim RC and Yen.
  • !Code 1kLikesOvernightRC - Insert this code to claim RC and Yen.
  • !Code ByeLaggyGyaMobs - Insert this code to claim RC and Yen.

Expired Ro Ghoul Codes

  • !Code Valent-eye-nes! - Insert this code to claim Exclusive Mask, 50 Color Credits RC and Yen.
  • !Code HNY25 - Insert this code to claim RC and Yen.
  • !Code HappyHolidays24! - Insert this code to claim RC and Yen.
  • !Code BoysARunner - Insert this code to claim 1,000,000 RC and 500,000 Yen.
  • !Code DayOfTheDead24 - Insert this code to claim 30 Color Credits and 30 Levels.
  • !Code Thanksgiving24 - Insert this code to claim RC and Yen.
  • !Code Hallow24 - Insert this code to claim 20 Levels, 1,000,000 RC, 10,000,000 Yen and 30 Color Credits.
  • !Code ISurvivedLegacyDashControls - Insert this code to claim 60 Color Credits and 40 Levels.
  • !Code Isn’t it Beautiful? - Insert this code to claim rewards.
  • !Code TheNextUpdateIsSoBeautiful - Insert this code to claim 20 Levels, 1,000,000 RC, and 10,000,000 Yen.
  • !Code GFBDAY24 - Insert this code to claim 20 Levels, 2,000,000 RC, 20,000,000 Yen and 50 Color Credits.
  • !Code Ro-Ghoulian - Insert this code to claim 20 Levels, 1,000,000 RC, 10,000,000 Yen and 30 Color Credits.
  • !Code TY FOR PLAYING :) - Insert this code to claim 1,000,000 RC and 10,000,000 Yen and 30 Color Credits.
  • !Code ReJ13 - Insert this code to claim +13 Levels.
  • !Code 1M-GROUP-MEMBERS - Insert this code to claim 100 Color Credits, 1,000,000 RC and 1,000,000 Yen.
  • !Code RGISBACK! - Insert this code to claim 1,000,000 RC and 500,000 Yen.
  • !Code ANNIVERSARY-6 - Insert this code to claim 6,000,000 RC and 60,000,000 Yen and 60 Color Credits.
  • !Code 2M FAVS - Insert this code to claim 2,000,000 RC and 2,000,000 Yen.
  • !Code TG-10th-ANNIVERSARY! - Insert this code to claim 10 Levels.
  • !Code 070424 - Insert this code to claim 1,000,000 RC and 500,000 Yen.
  • !Code trainerbrainrot - Insert this code to claim 1,000,000 RC and 10,000,000 Yen.
  • !Code ReCode! - Insert this code to claim 10 Levels or 30 Color Credits.
  • !Code OOPS TWO CODES - Insert this code to claim 10,000,000 Yen.
  • !Code Ribbon - Insert this code to claim 30 Color Credits.
  • !Code Gullible - Insert this code to claim 10 Levels.
  • !Code HNY2020 - Insert this code to claim 500,000 RC & 500,000 Yen.
  • !Code 500MV - Insert this code to claim 500,000 RC & 500,000 Yen.
  • !Code Sub2КоПанда - Insert this code to claim 50,000 Yen.
  • !Code Sub2Axiore - Insert this code to claim 50,000 Yen.
  • !Code Sub2EDITTY - Insert this code to claim 50,000 Yen.
  • !Code Sub2GoldenOwl - Insert this code to claim 50,000 Yen.
  • !Code Sub22KMz - Insert this code to claim 50,000 Yen.
  • !Code Sub2ibemaine - Insert this code to claim 50,000 Yen.
  • !RoballMask - Insert this code to claim a Mask.
  • !Code Sub2OrdinaryPotato - Insert this code to claim 50,000 Yen.
  • !Code Sub2Praveen - Insert this code to claim 50,000 Yen.
  • !Code Sub2Roball - Insert this code to claim 50,000 Yen.
  • !Code Sub2Sagee4 - Insert this code to claim 50,000 Yen.
  • !Code Sub2Sky1Ms - Insert this code to claim 50,000 Yen.
  • !Code Sub2xAomSakarin - Insert this code to claim 50,000 Yen.
  • !Code 1M FAVS - Insert this code to claim 1,00,000 RC and 1,00,000 Yen.
  • !Code ANNIVERSARY-5 - Insert this code to claim 5,000,000 RC & 5,000,000 Yen.
  • !Code XMAS23 - Insert this code to claim 1,00,000 RC and 500,000 Yen.
  • !Code Hallow23 - Insert this code to claim 1,00,000 RC and 500,000 Yen.
  • !Code ANNIVERSARY-4 - Insert this code to claim 4,000,000 RC & 4,000,000 Yen.
  • !Code ANNIVERSARY-2 - Insert this code to claim 2,020,000 RC & 2,020,000 Yen.
  • !Roziku - Insert this code to change hair color to green.
  • !TrafMask - Insert this code to claim a Traf Mask.
  • !ibemask - Insert this code to claim a Mask.
  • !Code Sub2Tokiitou - Insert this code to claim 50,000 Yen.
  • !Code 300MV - Insert this code to claim 50,000 Yen.
  • !Code FollowGODisPP - Insert this code to claim 50,000 Yen.

How to Redeem Codes in Ro Ghoul

Redeeming codes in Ro Ghoul is different from other Roblox games, but it is still not a difficult process. Players just need to follow the instructions below:

  • Open Roblox and launch Ro Ghoul .
  • Paste the code to The Chat window. It can be opened by using the "/" key on the keyboard or by clicking the speech bubble symbol in the top-left corner of the screen.
  • Write or paste the code in the following field.
  • Press “Enter.”

Ro Ghoul Tips and Tricks

Below are some tips and tricks to play Ro Ghoul :

  • Use trainers to level up and upgrade stats quickly.
  • Farm near the cafe to avoid enemy attacks.
  • Complete tasks for reputation points to earn more Yen.
  • Activate shift lock mode in settings and press shift for better combat.

The Best Roblox Anime Games Like Ro Ghoul

Anime is very popular in general, and anime Roblox games are no exception. This genre offers a lot of variety, so if players are looking for alternatives to this game, there are plenty of viable options. To help out, below is a list of the best Roblox games like Ro Ghoul :

  • Rogue Demon
  • Anime Adventures
  • A One Piece Game
  • Project Mugetsu
  • Project Slayers

About the Ro Ghoul Developer

Ro Ghoul was created by SushiWalrus on July 12, 2017. For a long time, he has been actively updating the game, but unfortunately, this is his only popular game.

item.title: Roblox: Driving Empire Codes (March 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Redeem Codes in Driving Empire
  • How to Play Driving Empire
  • The Best Roblox Racing Games Like Driving Empire
  • About the Driving Empire Developers

For Roblox players who cannot afford to buy themselves a new in-game car, there are Driving Empire codes that offer cash as a free reward. All of these active and expired codes can be found listed below. In addition, fans of the game will find step-by-step instructions on how to redeem Driving Empire codes here, along with a guide on how to play the popular Roblox game.

Updated March 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Driving Empire codes reward players with free money and other rewards. These bonuses will help you add to your car collection faster. Codes often come with game updates, so it's important to keep up to date. Don't miss out on free rewards by waiting too long.

Codes Checked on March 8, 2025.

Driving Empire Codes

All Working Driving Empire Codes

  • 200KMEMBERS - Claim code for 75k Cash (NEW)

  • ROBLOX - Claim code for Roblox Rim
  • Cameras - Claim code for a 2020 Chevey Camera S Car
  • SUMM3R - Claim code for a 2016 Portch Rover Car
  • SPOOKFEST2022 - Claim code for 75 Candies and Candy Wrap
  • SRY4D3L4Y - Claim code for Cash
  • C4N4D4 - Claim code for Canada Day Wrap
  • MEMBERS - Claim code for Cash
  • VALENTINES - Claim code for Cash
  • EMPIRE - Claim code for Cash
  • SPR1NGT1ME - Claim code for Cash
  • BIRD100K - Claim code for Rewards
  • HNY22 - Claim code for Cash
  • 400KMEMBERS - Claim code for Cash
  • OopsMyBadLol - Claim code for Cash
  • THANKS150M - Claim code for Cash
  • BURRITO - Claim code for Cash
  • COMMUNITY - Claim code for Cash
  • 100MVISITS - Claim code for Cash
  • 90MVISITS - Claim code for Cash
  • COMMUNITY - Claim code for Cash

How to Redeem Codes in Driving Empire

Like with many other Roblox games, Driving Empire codes are available for everyone. To redeem them, players need only follow the straightforward steps below to claim their free rewards:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Driving Empire.
  2. Look in the bottom left corner and press the Settings button here.
  3. From here, go into the Codes tab and insert the code into the text box.
  4. Once done, press Submit and claim rewards.

Codes can only be redeemed once per account. That said, players can claim the same code on multiple accounts.

How to Play Driving Empire

Playing Driving Empire is very simple and fun. To begin with, after the player has appeared in the world, they'll need to choose a car. There are many real-world cars in the game and each of them has its own characteristics, but only two cars will be available at first. To earn money, players have to drive, drift, and participate in races. For the money earned, players can buy a new car or motorbike. With the Driving Empire codes in this article, Roblox players can buy new vehicles even faster.

The Best Roblox Racing Games Like Driving Empire

There are a lot of Roblox games with the theme of racing and cars in general, and among them are plenty of good ones that offer an interesting gaming experience. In this article, players will find the best games like Driving Empire :

  • Car Dealership Tycoon
  • Drive World
  • Southwest Florida
  • Vehicle Legends
  • Ultimate Driving

About the Driving Empire Developers

Driving Empire was created by a group of developers who call themselves Voldex. Although they have released one game so far, their Roblox group already has 2 million members.

  • Best Roblox Shooter Games Like Da Hood

Da Hood is inspired by the popular Grand Theft Auto series, with the developers also managing to implement the atmosphere of gangster blocks and constant shootings. In this article, Roblox players will find plenty of codes for Da Hood , which they can then redeem to get cash and buy good weapons.

Updated March 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Da Hood codes only give you cash in the game, but it's a great way to stock up on resources without grinding. With so many DHC on offer in this guide, you're sure to find something to keep you entertained. Keep in mind that codes can expire at any time, so be sure to use them before they disappear.

How to Redeem Codes in Da Hood

When it comes to redeeming codes in Da Hood , players just need to follow a few quick steps:

  1. Launch Da Hood
  2. Click on the Treasure Chest button on the bottom left of the screen
  3. Click inside the Enter Code Here box and paste the code
  4. Click Redeem to complete the process

Da Hood Tips and Tricks

To have a good time in the game, players need to have Da Hood Cash. To get Da Hood Cash, they can visit various stores, some of which will pay them for collecting shoes. Alternatively, players can use the above codes, which will provide them with a large amount of Da Hood Cash. In order to avoid feeling sad from the constant harassment of other gamers, players need to find and buy weapons, ammunition, and armor, which can be found in certain stores.

Best Roblox Shooter Games Like Da Hood

Although Da Hood is a fun game, there may come a time when it becomes boring. Often, in such cases, players look for alternatives. And to make it all easier for them, below is a list of the best games like Da Hood :

  • Ohio
  • Arsenal
  • East Brickton
  • Combat Warriors
  • Military Tycoon

About the Da Hood Developers

Da Hood developers are pretty productive, and their Da Hood Entertainment group has over 1 million members. They are also very active on their Discord server, where users can find many exciting things.

item.title: Roblox: Anime Adventures Codes (March 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Anime Adventures Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes In Anime Adventures
  • Anime Adventure Tips and Tricks
  • Best Roblox Anime Games Like Anime Adventures
  • About the Anime Adventures Developers

If Roblox players want some freebies in Anime Adventures then they've come to the right place. In this article, they'll find a complete list of Anime Adventure codes. By redeeming these codes, Roblox players will receive free gems that will come in handy in their playthrough.

Updated March 8, 2025, by Tom Bowen: After what seems like an eternity, Update 20 is finally upon us, and, to celebrate the occasion, a new Anime Adventures code has just been unveiled. Players can redeem the code UPD20INCOMING to get some free in-game goodies, after which, they should bookmark this page to avoid missing out on future freebies. We're always on the lookout for new codes for Anime Adventures, so checking back here often is the best way to avoid disappointment.

All Anime Adventures Codes

All Active Anime Adventures Codes

  • UPD20INCOMING - Redeem code for free rewards
  • ASSASSIN - Redeem code for free rewards
  • UPDSOON - Redeem code for free rewards
  • MILLIONFAVES - Redeem code for free rewards

  • MERRYCHRISTMAS - Redeem code for free rewards
  • HOLIDAYS2024 - Redeem code for free rewards

Most Anime Adventures codes can only be redeemed by players who have reached Level 20.

All Expired Anime Adventures Codes

  • AMEGAKURE - Redeem for rewards
  • SIXPATHSUPD - Redeem for rewards

  • OVERLORD - Redeem for 500 Gems
  • SUMMER2023 - Redeem for 200 Gems

How to Redeem Codes In Anime Adventures

When it comes to redeeming codes in Anime Adventures, there are a few simple steps to follow that will be listed below. If, for some reason, a code does not work, be sure to check to see if the code has been entered correctly.

If the code still doesn't work, this may mean that it has recently expired or has already been claimed. When claiming codes for free tickets, the player will need to keep exiting and re-entering the codes circle to get the input menu to pop back up.

  1. Launch Anime Adventures
  2. Walk through the main area to the Codes storefront
  3. Enter the blue ring and input a code from our list into the box and click redeem

Anime Adventure Tips and Tricks

Farming Gems

After beating Planet Namek, players should focus on Infinity Castle to get 150 gems every 5-6 minutes. If players can't do Infinity Castle, they can try Planet Namek Infinity Wave 25 or join raids for extra gems.

Challenges

Players should always prioritize Star Fruit challenges for unit evolution. Star Fruits rainbow challenge helps with Rainbow Fruit acquisition. Star Remnant challenges are necessary for mythic unit rolls.

XP Farming

Act 4 is the fastest way to gain unit XP, while Planet Namek Act 1 is ideal for player XP. Also, players should fuse duplicate units instead of selling them. This will provide them with more efficient leveling.

Best Roblox Anime Games Like Anime Adventures

There are many other interesting anime and manga games on Roblox . Below, players will find the five best games like Anime Adventures . These fantastic Roblox games also offer a good gaming experience and are related to anime:

  • Anime Fruit Simulator
  • Anime Souls Simulator
  • Anime Lost Simulator
  • Anime Power Tycoon
  • Anime Catching Simulator

About the Anime Adventures Developers

Anime Adventures was released quite recently by the Gomu development team. At the moment, this is the only game by these developers, but players are waiting for new ones to pop up.
